scripts.install-rustup: echo 'Installing Rustup...'; curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y --no-modify-path --default-host x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --default-toolchain stable; export PATH="$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin:$PATH"
scripts.build: yarn run install-rustup && yarn run install-wasm-pack &&  yarn wasm && vite build
